announcement.goals.awesome_binglus: You have lots of notes, feel free to write.
announcement.goals.bartender: Can see through walls to spot players who are drinking!
announcement.goals.conductor: Use the Master Key to open all doors on the train!
announcement.goals.executioner: Become a Killer when your target is killed by a non-Killer.
announcement.goals.jester: Find the Killer and cooperate with them.
announcement.goals.noisemaker: Reveal your location to all players upon death.
announcement.goals.phantom: Become invisible, but be careful not to bump into others.
announcement.goals.recaller: Teleport to any location on the train!
announcement.goals.gambler: 33% chance of identity change after death.
announcement.goals.photographer: Photograph as many crimes as possible!
announcement.goals.the_insane_damned_par: I can hear the voices of the dead.
announcement.goals.trapper: Check the identity of other players.
announcement.goals.voodoo: Choose a player to die with you.
announcement.goals.vulture: Eat corpses to transform into a Killer.
announcement.goals.sheriff: Complete tasks with your gun to earn coins.
hud.voodoo.tip: Voodoo death must be triggered by another player!
hud.vulture.already_consumed: This corpse has already been consumed.
item.noellesroles.defense_vial.tooltip:
Right-click on a drink tray to use
Removes all poison from the tray
Gives the drinker an extra chance against death.
item.noellesroles.delusion_vial.tooltip:
Right-click on a food/drink tray to use
Creates fake poison; players who consume it
think they are poisoned, but suffer no real effects.
item.noellesroles.sheriff_gun_maintenanc:
Right-click to maintain your revolver
Restores durability and resets cooldown
Gain 150 coins after use
message.broadcaster.example_message: Watch out! The killer is nearby!
screen.broadcaster.title: Broadcast Message
announcement.goals.illusionist: Use hallucination bottles to disrupt enemies' vision!
info.screen.roleid.illusionist: Use hallucination bottles to disrupt enemies' vision, can purchase them to create mist and alter surrounding players' vision
announcement.goals.avenger: Protect your bound target. If they die, you gain vengeful power!
announcement.goals.conspirator: Guess other players' roles. If correct, they die in 20 seconds!
announcement.goals.example_killer: Eliminate all passengers without being discovered.
announcement.goals.slippery_ghost: Use your exclusive shop to disrupt others and win with the Killers!
announcement.goals.telegrapher: Use your ability to send anonymous messages to all players, up to 6 times!
announcement.goals.engineer: Use repair tools and alarm traps to protect passengers from Killer sabotage!
announcement.goals.boxer: Use 'Steel Body' to counter attackers and protect yourself and passengers!
announcement.goals.postman: Use mail to secretly exchange items with players.
announcement.goals.detective: Spend 200 coins to inspect a player's inventory. Closes if target moves!
item.noellesroles.conspiracy_page.toolti: Right-click to use and guess a player's role
item.noellesroles.blank_cartridge.toolti: Right-click on target player to put their held gun on 30s cooldown
item.noellesroles.smoke_grenade.tooltip: Throw to create a smoke cloud causing blindness; direct hit clears target's sanity
item.noellesroles.reinforcement.tooltip: Right-click on door to reinforce (blocks one crowbar); sneak + right-click to unjam and remove items
item.noellesroles.alarm_trap.tooltip: Right-click on door to place; triggers alarm when crowbar is used
item.noellesroles.delivery_box.tooltip: Aim at player and right-click to open secret exchange interface
message.noellesroles.avenger.bound: You are protecting %s. If they die, you gain vengeful power!
message.noellesroles.avenger.activated: %s has been killed! Your vengeance awakens!
message.noellesroles.conspirator.correct: You guessed correctly! %s will die in 20 seconds...
message.noellesroles.conspirator.wrong: You guessed wrong! %s is not that role.
message.noellesroles.conspirator.wrong_w: You guessed wrong! %s is not that role. (%s guesses remaining)
message.noellesroles.conspirator.too_man: You guessed wrong too many times! The conspiracy backfires...
message.noellesroles.conspirator.cursed: You feel a mysterious power enveloping you...
message.noellesroles.conspirator.killed: %s has been killed by your conspiracy!
message.noellesroles.conspirator.not_con: Only the Conspirator can use this item!
tip.noellesroles.conspirator.no_target: Use a Conspiracy Book Page to guess a player's role
screen.noellesroles.conspirator.title: Book of Conspiracy
screen.noellesroles.conspirator.hint: Press ESC to go back or cancel
message.noellesroles.slippery_ghost.blan: Target is not holding a gun!
message.noellesroles.slippery_ghost.smok: %s was directly hit by smoke grenade, sanity cleared!
tip.noellesroles.slippery_ghost.shop: Press TAB to open Slippery Ghost Shop
tip.noellesroles.telegrapher.hint: Press G to open Telegraph interface
screen.noellesroles.telegrapher.title: Telegraph Editor
message.noellesroles.engineer.reinforced: Door reinforced! Can withstand one crowbar attack.
message.noellesroles.engineer.already_br: This door is broken and cannot be reinforced!
message.noellesroles.engineer.not_engine: Only the Engineer can use this item!
message.noellesroles.engineer.trap_trigg: Alarm! Someone is breaking the door lock!
message.noellesroles.engineer.reinforcem: Reinforcement destroyed by crowbar, but the door remains intact
tip.noellesroles.engineer.shop: Press TAB to open Engineer Shop
message.noellesroles.postman.delivery_re: %s wants to exchange items with you
tip.noellesroles.postman.shop: Press TAB to open Postman Shop
hud.noellesroles.detective.ready: Inspection ready! Aim and press G
screen.noellesroles.postman.title: Secret Delivery
screen.noellesroles.postman.hint: Click slots to place items, complete after both confirm
message.noellesroles.boxer.ability_activ: Steel Body activated! Immune to death for 1.5 seconds!
message.noellesroles.boxer.counter_succe: Counter successful! %s was deflected by your Steel Body!
message.noellesroles.boxer.counter_knife: Your knife was deflected! Going on cooldown...
announcement.goals.athlete: Use your infinite stamina and sprint ability to help passengers complete tasks!
message.noellesroles.athlete.ability_act: Sprint activated! Speed boosted for 20 seconds!
announcement.goals.stalker: Observe from the shadows, feeding on fear. Evolve to hunt everyone.
message.noellesroles.stalker.immunity_tr: At the last moment, something protected you.
announcement.goals.admirer: Observe your bound target to accumulate energy. Turn into a Killer at full energy!
hud.noellesroles.admirer.title: Admirer
message.noellesroles.trapper.no_ground: No ground found to place trap!
message.noellesroles.trapper.trap_trigge: You triggered a trap! Imprisoned for %s seconds!
message.noellesroles.trapper.mark_count: You have been marked %s times, imprisonment extended!
announcement.goals.star: You are in the spotlight! Glow for 2s every 20s. Use ability to make nearby players look at you!
hud.noellesroles.star.title: Star
message.noellesroles.star.attracted: ✨ Your gaze is drawn to the Star!
announcement.goals.veteran: You are a veteran. Start with a knife. It disappears after one kill.
message.noellesroles.veteran.knife_used: Your knife has been used and disappeared!
announcement.goals.singer: You are a singer! Press ability key to play random record music for others to hear!
hud.noellesroles.singer.title: Singer
announcement.goals.psychologist: When your sanity is above 70, aim at a player and keep them still for 10s to fully restore their sanity!
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.title: Psychologist
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.ready: Heal Ready - Aim and Press G
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.not_ready: Your sanity must be >70 to heal others
message.noellesroles.psychologist.not_fu: Your sanity must be above 70 to use this ability!
message.noellesroles.psychologist.healin: Started healing %s. Keep target still for 10 seconds!
message.noellesroles.psychologist.being_: %s is healing your mind. Stay still!
announcement.goals.puppeteer: Collect corpses to evolve. After evolving, use collected corpses to create puppets and control them to hunt!
hud.noellesroles.puppeteer.title: Puppeteer
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.phase2_ad: You've collected enough corpses! You are now a Puppet Master!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.puppet_ac: Puppet activated! You have %s seconds to hunt!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.puppet_ti: Puppet time exhausted, returning to body...
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.body_died: Your body was killed! Game over.
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.shop_bloc: Puppet Master cannot use shop in body mode!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.ability_c: Puppet ability on cooldown, %s seconds remaining
announcement.goals.manipulator: You can select a player as your target. Your movement and view inputs will be copied to the target player. The manipulated player cannot move, look around, or use items!
hud.noellesroles.manipulator.title: Manipulator
